title: Stop Fu*king Explaining Yourself!
itunes:title: Stop Fu*king Explaining Yourself!
itunes:subtitle: This week, Gary's laying out some fundamental truths behind why you need to stop spinning up stories and how your backstory is just another mechanism for you to make bullshit excuses.
description:
Everybody loves a good story, right? That's what many of us believe, but this week, Gary's laying out some fundamental truths behind why you need to stop spinning up stories and how your backstory is just another mechanism for you to make bullshit excuses. So, come join the nation and get your story straight with the help of Gary's insights on these big questions from our listeners:


  • How can I be a storyteller without getting caught up in the backstory?
  • How can I bridge the gap between setting context for myself when setting a goal without overcommitting to the backstory?
  • Is context another way of saying "living first with intention: and purpose? Will context help me set more purposeful goals?
  • I feel like I've got years of knowledge and nowhere to go with it. How can I rise above this?


All that and more on this episode of Unfuck Nation with Gary John Bishop!


Are You Ready to Unfuck Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfuck Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfuck Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
